meanings.definition: The act of striking something lightly
meanings.sent1: She heard the soft tappings on the window as the rain began to fall.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's tappings on the floor added a rhythmic beat to the music.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful tappings on the toy mouse made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tappings of the woodpecker echoed through the quiet forest.
meanings.sent5: The tappings of the typewriter filled the room with a sense of productivity.

meanings.definition: The act of drawing liquid from a container
meanings.sent1: He carefully controlled the tappings of the keg to fill each glass evenly.
meanings.sent2: The bartender's quick tappings ensured that the beer flowed smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The tappings of the maple tree produced the sweetest syrup in town.
meanings.sent4: The tappings of the coffee machine signaled the start of a busy morning.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic tappings of the soda dispenser were oddly satisfying to listen to.

meanings.definition: The sound made by striking something lightly
meanings.sent1: The tappings of the wind chime created a soothing melody in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious tappings in the attic kept the children on edge.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected tappings on the door startled the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic tappings of the drum signaled the start of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The gentle tappings of the rain on the roof lulled her into a peaceful sleep.
